name: Vectrex Style Bee Shooter concept
description:
A prototype that is not actually a working game. Just testing out some math to make fake 3D in the spirit of the Vectrex game system from the 80's.

Donate money if you want to see a full shooter game made out of this, If I get to $25 I will make a real arcade style shooter out of this!

Thanks!

-Alex, one half of Two Scoop Games
